Summary by Benzinga Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ: MSFT)-owned LinkedIn has recently significantly advanced in the digital advertising market. In 2023, its annual advertising revenue surged to nearly $4 billion, marking a 10.1% increase from the previous year. Research group Insider Intelligence forecasts a further 14.1% growth in 2024.
